term.title: calcination

item.text: Heating to high temperatures in air or oxygen.

notes.item: The term is most likely to be applied to a step in the preparation of a catalyst.
In sol-gel processing the term applies to the heating of a polymer network containing metal compounds to convert it into an oxide network.
Modified from previous definition. The definition proposed here is more explicit about the elevated temperatures that are required.
